entry.data:
CLEAR
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE MID 30S
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

SUNNY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY SUNNY
PATCHY FROST IN THE MORNING
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 50S
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
AREAS OF FROST AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S
NORTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

WIDESPREAD FROST IN THE MORNING
SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
EAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN PARTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE MID 40S
SOUTHEAST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

SHOWERS LIKELY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE EVENING, THEN SHOWERS LIKELY AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 60 PERCENT

SHOWERS LIKELY WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING, THEN A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT
